TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_bzngah, title = bzngah, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/bzngah} }

S.FORM: bzngah yasa qu pkaki' kya babaw kayal ka ttaypuq balay ru pyax, pyax smyax ktan. pnawngan pintkaykay' na nbkis sraral hya' qu bzngah qani hya' ga ramu' na wagi' ka wal bun na squliq maha ma. yalaw gi minsazing qu wagi' mru mkilux iayl qu kayal lmru, stu' naha' sa sazing mrkyas mlikuy musa' smbu' lma, nanu' bun naha' qu wagi' lga mprpus tay babaw kayal qu ramu' niya' lru yasa qu nyux ta' ktan ka bzngah qani la.

bzngah yasa qo pkaki' kya babaw kayal ka ttaypoq balay ro pyax, pyax smyax ktan. pnawngan pintkaykay' na nbkis sraral hya' qo bzngah qani hya' ga ramo' na wagi' ka wal bon na sqoliq maha ma. yalaw gi minsazing qo wagi' mro mkilox iayl qo kayal lmro, sto' naha' sa sazing mrkyas mlikoy mosa' smbo' lma, nano' bon naha' qo wagi' lga mprpos tay babaw kayal qo ramo' niya' lro yasa qo nyox ta' ktan ka bzngah qani la.
